org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.bridge.implementation

Class RedisMessagingConcreteImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simulationsystems.csf.common.internal.messaging.bridge.implementation.RedisMessagingConcreteImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonMessagingImplementationAPI

    public class RedisMessagingConcreteImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommonMessagingImplementationAPI
    The concrete implementor in the Bridge pattern for use of the Redis in-memory cache.
    Also acts as the client in the DAO pattern (through composition), to retrieve the data from one of the common data interfaces, in this case the in-memory database Redis.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jorge Calderon
